attributes.action: regulate veterinary pricing to ensure fair charging policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vet practices can charge exactly what they wish with no regard to pricing policies.  There is no regulation that ensures owners are fairly charged for services and medicines.  Med prices are highly inflated It is against the law to administer meds or care to an animal enabling vets no competition and the public no choice.
